header.title: Environment Setup
header.description: Environment variables and configuration guide. Configure Endorphin AI with simple environment variables for different environments.

quickSetup.title: Quick Setup
quickSetup.step1: 1. Create a .env file in your project root:
quickSetup.ready: You're ready to go with just your OpenAI API key.

availableVariables.title: Available Variables
availableVariables.description: Complete list of environment variables you can configure

openaiApiKey.title: OPENAI_API_KEY (Required)
openaiApiKey.description: Your OpenAI API key for AI-powered testing.

headless.title: HEADLESS (Optional)
headless.description: Run browser with or without UI.

options.false: HEADLESS=false  # See the browser (good for debugging)
options.true: HEADLESS=true   # No browser window (good for CI/CD)

endorphinDebug.title: ENDORPHIN_DEBUG (Optional)
endorphinDebug.description: Enable debug mode for detailed logging.

method1.title: Method 1: Multiple .env Files
method1.description: Create separate files for each environment:

method2.title: Method 2: Environment Variables
method2.description: Set variables directly in command line:

useEnvironmentVariables.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Use Environment Variables in CI
useEnvironmentVariables.description: Set OPENAI_API_KEY as a secret in your CI/CD platform
